query:
SELECT f.id, f.title, f.fileSize, f.mimeType, LEFT(f.url, 100) as url_prefix, LEFT(f.fileKey, 100) as fileKey_prefix,
       vt.id as transcript_id, vt.status as transcript_status, LEFT(vt.errorMessage, 200) as errorMsg, vt.updatedAt as transcript_updated
FROM files f 
LEFT JOIN video_transcripts vt ON vt.fileId = f.id
WHERE f.id = 1770203\G
